sections.title: Shifter (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Shifter class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Shifter)
sections.description: Shifters are proficient with specific weapons, light/medium nonmetal armor, and natural attacks from their forms, but lose abilities when wearing prohibited armor.

sections.title: Bonus Languages (Shifter)
sections.description: Shifters gain Sylvan and Aklo as bonus language options and automatically know Druidic, which they cannot teach to non-druids or non-shifters.

sections.title: Shifter Aspect (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Shifters can assume minor forms of animal aspects for minutes per day as a swift action, gaining additional aspects as they level.

sections.title: Shifter Claws (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Shifters can extend magical claws as natural attacks that scale with level, bypassing various damage reduction types and enhancing wild shape natural attacks.

sections.title: Wild Empathy (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Improves animal attitudes using shifter level and Charisma modifier, functioning like Diplomacy but for animals and low-intelligence magical beasts.

sections.title: Defensive Instinct (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Adds Wisdom bonus to AC and CMD when unarmored or lightly armored, with scaling enhancement bonuses that apply against touch attacks.

sections.title: Track (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Adds half shifter level as a bonus to Survival checks made to follow tracks.

sections.title: Woodland Stride (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Allows movement through natural undergrowth at normal speed without damage, but magical terrain still affects the shifter.

sections.title: Wild Shape (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Transform into major forms of aspects using beast shape II mechanics, with hours per day equal to shifter level plus Wisdom modifier.

sections.title: Trackless Step (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Leaves no trail in natural surroundings and cannot be tracked unless the shifter chooses to leave a trail.

sections.title: Shifter’s Fury (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Allows iterative attacks with a single natural weapon while treating other natural attacks as secondary attacks.

sections.title: Chimeric Aspect (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Allows assuming minor forms of two aspects simultaneously when using shifter aspect ability.

sections.title: Greater Chimeric Aspect (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Allows assuming minor forms of up to three aspects simultaneously when using shifter aspect ability.

sections.title: A Thousand Faces (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: Can change appearance at will using alter self spell effects, but only while in normal form.

sections.title: Timeless Body (Ex) (Shifter)
sections.description: No longer takes ability score penalties for aging and cannot be magically aged, but still dies of old age.

sections.title: Final Aspect (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Gains a fifth aspect, can assume all minor forms simultaneously, and can use major and minor forms at will.

sections.title: Flexible Form (Su) (Shifter)
sections.description: Gains +6 total bonus to physical ability scores when using wild shape, distributable as desired each time shifted.

sections.title: Bat (Shifter)
sections.description: Bat aspect grants darkvision and blindsense in minor form, dire bat shape with flight and Flyby Attack in major form.

sections.title: Bear (Shifter)
sections.description: Bear aspect provides Constitution enhancement in minor form, dire bear shape with grab claws and Awesome Blow in major form.

sections.title: Boar (Shifter)
sections.description: Boar aspect grants Diehard feat and death threshold improvement in minor form, dire boar with powerful charge in major form.

sections.title: Bull (Shifter)
sections.description: Bull aspect provides Strength enhancement in minor form, large bull shape with powerful charge and trample in major form.

sections.title: Crocodile (Shifter)
sections.description: Crocodile aspect grants Swim and grapple bonuses in minor form, crocodile shape with grab bite and prone grappling in major form.

sections.title: Deinonychus (Shifter)
sections.description: Deinonychus aspect provides Initiative bonuses in minor form, deinonychus shape with pounce and Spring Attack in major form.

sections.title: Dolphin (Shifter)
sections.description: Dolphin aspect grants Knowledge check bonuses in minor form, large dolphin shape with blindsense and breath holding in major form.

sections.title: Dragonfly (Shifter)
sections.description: Dragonfly aspect provides charging speed bonus in minor form, giant dragonfly shape with flight and Flyby Attack in major form.

sections.title: Electric Eel (Shifter)
sections.description: Electric eel aspect adds electricity damage to attacks in minor form, electric eel shape with electrical attacks and stunning in major form.

sections.title: Elephant (Shifter)
sections.description: Elephant aspect grants bull rush and overrun bonuses in minor form, elephant shape with trample and mount capability in major form.

sections.title: Falcon (Shifter)
sections.description: Falcon aspect provides Perception bonuses in minor form, small falcon shape with flight and enhanced senses in major form.

sections.title: Frog (Shifter)
sections.description: Frog aspect grants Acrobatics and Swim bonuses in minor form, large frog shape with tongue attack and enhanced jumping in major form.

sections.title: Giant Wasp (Shifter)
sections.description: Giant wasp aspect provides Will save bonuses in minor form, giant wasp shape with poison sting and swarm control in major form.

sections.title: Horse (Shifter)
sections.description: Horse aspect grants Endurance, Run, and speed bonuses in minor form, horse shape with Ride-By Attack and trample in major form.

sections.title: Lion (Shifter)
sections.description: Lion aspect provides Intimidate bonuses in minor form, dire lion shape with roar ability and teamwork feats in major form.

sections.title: Lizard (Shifter)
sections.description: Lizard aspect grants Acrobatics bonuses in minor form, giant lizard shape with grab bite and trip tail in major form.

sections.title: Mantis (Shifter)
sections.description: Mantis aspect provides Lunge feat and reach in minor form, giant mantis shape with grab claws and initiative mastery in major form.

sections.title: Monkey (Shifter)
sections.description: Monkey aspect grants Climb bonuses in minor form, large monkey shape with climb speed and rend attack in major form.

sections.title: Mouse (Shifter)
sections.description: Mouse aspect provides evasion in minor form, tiny mouse shape with enhanced mobility and no opportunity attacks in major form.

sections.title: Octopus (Shifter)
sections.description: Octopus aspect grants Escape Artist bonuses in minor form, octopus shape with tentacle grab and ink cloud in major form.

sections.title: Owl (Shifter)
sections.description: Owl aspect provides Stealth bonuses in minor form, medium owl shape with flight and Snatch ability in major form.

sections.title: Peafowl (Shifter)
sections.description: Peafowl aspect grants Charisma enhancement in minor form, small peafowl shape with captivating dance and stunning in major form.

sections.title: Scorpion (Shifter)
sections.description: Scorpion aspect provides Stealth and grapple bonuses in minor form, giant scorpion shape with tremorsense and poison sting in major form.

sections.title: Snake (Shifter)
sections.description: Snake aspect grants attack of opportunity bonuses in minor form, emperor cobra shape with Combat Reflexes and poison bite in major form.

sections.title: Snapping Turtle (Shifter)
sections.description: Snapping turtle aspect provides Wisdom enhancement in minor form, giant snapping turtle shape with CMD bonuses and damage reduction in major form.

sections.title: Spider (Shifter)
sections.description: Spider aspect grants Climb and web resistance bonuses in minor form, giant spider shape with web attack and tremorsense in major form.

sections.title: Stag (Shifter)
sections.description: Stag aspect provides speed bonuses in minor form, large stag shape with gore attack and Awesome Blow in major form.

sections.title: Tiger (Shifter)
sections.description: Tiger aspect grants Dexterity enhancement in minor form, dire tiger shape with pounce and rake attacks in major form.

sections.title: Wolf (Shifter)
sections.description: Wolf aspect provides scent ability in minor form, dire wolf shape with trip bite and enhanced tracking in major form.

sections.title: Wolverine (Shifter)
sections.description: Wolverine aspect grants additional hit points and death threshold in minor form, dire wolverine shape with rage ability in major form.
